entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:23 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parent 12:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

Humidity: 79 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
